topic.title: Start Here!
topic.shortdesc: If you are a first-time user, you can get a great, quick introduction to using Couchbase Server, just by reading this section. In a few brief steps, you obtain direct experience of installing, running, and performing interactive queries on the server.

section.title: Steps for First-Time Users
